title: Game doesn't load after champ select and now it crashes after champs select
body: I was told to make a trash dump and send it here to fix my problem please have a look i just wanna play league again

replies.body: This is likely related to the content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through it and posting there if the problem continues.
